name: Derby Jockey 2001
overview: Derby Jockey began it's life on the Super Famicom and has evolved from 2-D racing to full blown 3-D featuring thundering hoofs and thrilling races. In DJ 2K1, you begin the game with an untrained horse who needs to be broken in and adapted to the ways of his new masters. With the proper training, the horse will help you capture stakes and acclaim. New to the 2001 version are detailed horse training and arcade style racing on horseback.
